oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Observe anniversary, from the Nashville Times, 1940 April
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about the Golden Wedding anniversary of Mr. and Mrs. Hawkins. The caption reads: “Triune, Tenn., April 13 (Spl.)--Mr. and Mrs. Hawkins recently celebrated their Golden Wedding anniversary with a dinner at their home here, attended by members of their family. Guests present included their children, Henry Hawkins, Mrs. Henry McDowell, Miss Annie Lee Hawkins, and Clyde Hawkins, of Triune; B. Hawkins, of Nashville; and Hugh Hawkins of Bethesda, and their families.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hawkins family
